name: co-hire
slogan: The one, simple place that great people go to find work
description:
co-hire is a technology start-up of 10 people, on a mission to build the one simple place great people go to find work. Hundreds of companies have used co-hire to hire out their technology teams, from bootstrapped early stage startups to McKinsey, Google and Facebook owned VC backed scale ups. To date we’ve started 1,000’s of conversations. But this is only the start …


We’re a diverse team of talented, like-minded, value driven people, focussed on creating positive change at scale. We look for people who naturally lead from the front and work best in a results driven environment. We believe this gives people freedom, autonomy and a clear focus.


Our office is right next to London Bridge Station in Central London.

jobs.title: Customer Success Manager
jobs.description:
co-hire is a technology start-up of 10 people, on a mission to build the one simple place great people go to find work. Hundreds of companies have used co-hire to hire out their technology teams, from bootstrapped early stage startups to McKinsey, Google and Facebook owned VC backed scale ups. To date we’ve started 1,000’s of conversations. But this is only the start …


We’re a diverse team of talented, like-minded, value driven people, focussed on creating positive change at scale. We look for people who naturally lead from the front and work best in a results driven environment. We believe this gives people freedom, autonomy and a clear focus.


We don’t rush our hiring, and we don’t make someone an offer lightly. But when we do, we back them. We invest in the craft of our work, prioritise individual learning and execute collaboratively.


Our office is right next to London Bridge Station in Central London.


About the Job


You will join as the first hire into our Customer Success team, working directly with our Head of Customer Experience. The Customer Success team has one simple focus; creating incredible experiences at every interaction, for the hundreds of high growth technology companies that use co-hire to scale their teams. We are champions of co-hire, and by providing an incredible experience to people, we create champions of co-hire too.


You’ll work directly with some of London’s fastest growing companies like Ovo Energy, ThoughtMachine & Depop to understand their objectives and help them realise them. You will learn how a cutting edge technology product actually works (inside and out), and you’ll use the feedback from our users to influence our product direction. You will use your industry and product knowledge to build meaningful relationships with CTO’s, co-founders and Heads of Talent in London start-ups. You will love knowing that your influence and advice will allow these companies to grow. You are excited about the prospect of scaling not just the start-ups we work with, but the co-hire Customer Success team too. You will focus on results and growth above all else.


Our culture encourages the outliers and rewards the high achievers who grasp ownership.The ideal candidate will a strong knowledge of how to recruit technology and product people, and use this to advise and improve our users results. Preferably you will have worked in-house, but agency experience will still be considered. It will suit someone that wants to move their career into something more challenging and rewarding, using these skills as a building block for a new career in Customer Success Management in a SaaS company.


Experience Requirements:


*You have done something exceptional, it doesn’t matter where or when *You have experience recruiting technology positions for high growth software companies (in-house or agency)



Personal Requirements:


*You don’t want to just help one company scale, you want to help hundreds *You enjoy working with and advising Senior/c-level decision makers *You love tech and understand how products are built *You love dealing with people *You think like everyone at co-hire, and believing “anything is do-able” *You care deeply about people, and fully grasp the value that giving control back to people (and companies) can have on their lives and the economy *You like to have fun at work


Beneficial Experience:


*Experience recruiting for non-technical positions in high growth software companies (Marketing, Sales, *Operations etc) *A Degree from a reputable University *Experience working in a fast pace, growing company where things change quickly


Benefits:


*Unlimited holiday: We run on results, not facetime *Stock Options: Everyone has stock *Flexible working: No fixed office hours & work from home when it suits you better *Culture: A supportive culture than actively encourages continuous learning and progression *A Fun & Rewarding Environment: Stimulating, fast paced, meaningful & exciting
